chat_history.message: Hello, My product iPhone 13 has the above problem. Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

The customer has received his order and has been informed of the following:

The appliance was apparently not cleaned before shipping. It is dirty, one large and many small grease stains, dust, streaks, etc. 

His question is how he should proceed. He has not yet cleaned the appliance and therefore cannot say whether there are any scratches. He can't say anything about the technical function either. 

How should the customer proceed? How should he clean the appliance?

Can you offer the customer compensation so that he can keep the device?

I would be pleased to receive an answer from you.

Have a nice day.

Regards,
Angelica from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare, 

Please inform the following message to the customer. 

We are so sorry that you are unhappy with our product. 

We suggest wiping the device with a microfibre cloth on your end to get rid of all the dusts and stains on it.

Rather than sending a return, would you consider a 20 euros commercial gesture instead? You could save the harmful carbon dioxide emissions generated by logistics carriers in facilitating a return of a device which is perfectly functional and fit to use for many years ahead.

Thank you.
Regards, 
JH

Hello Ulrich,

You can find your return label in the attachment of this message. Chronopost will handle your return. Simply drop off your package at a nearby return location listed here: 

Before you prepare your return:
1. Follow these instructions on how to return an item <https://help.backmarket.com/hc/en-us/articles/360014698640-Returns-and-refunds-instructions>
2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your product.
3. Remove any existing protective cover or film.
4. Wrap your product and its accessories according to the tips below.

How to wrap your product:
• The box should be sturdy and stable, with your product situated so it doesn't move during transport.
• Attach the return label on top of the box (you can also attach a backup label inside for identification in case the original is lost or damaged).
• Take photos of the package from the inside and outside before shipping. This protects you in case your product is damaged during transport.

Your return is now ready to be dropped off! We'll let you know when it arrives at our facility.

Best regards,
Back Market Customer Care, Back Market Customer Care

Hello,

My iPhone 13 has the above problem.

Thank you for your help,

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.
We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Angelica Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare, 

Thank you. We are still processing the device. Will update you soon once we finish checking the device. Thank you.

Regards, 
KW

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
JY
